img_above_text:
* Spells to Unlock to Upgrade Rock Solid
## How to Unlock the Rock Solid Spell
img_below_text:
Can you parry in Black Myth: Wukong? The short answer is no, not in the traditional sense. But you can deflect enemy attacks, and to do so requires the **Rock Solid spell**. This is a defensive spell that will allow you to stagger enemies and open up the possibility of performing counterattacks.
![How To Parry \(2\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/00/How_To_Parry_%282%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a character in *Black Myth: Wukong* performing or demonstrating the **Rock Solid spell**, which is a defensive ability. The character appears encased in a metallic, stone-like texture, with debris floating around, emphasizing the spell's protective and sturdy nature. The accompanying text at the bottom states, "This body of yours is perfect for the art of Rock Solid," reinforcing the focus on mastering this spell. The image supports the guide's explanation of using the Rock Solid spell to deflect enemy attacks and stagger opponents.
